participant_2.background:
My students are my favorite people because they make me laugh and smile every day.
I love the suburbs because I have more space for my family and our movie collection.
i am 29 years old.
I use my laptop to work on lessons while I'm at the park.
I love to spend time with my cat, especially when I'm feeling stressed from school.

content.text: Hi! I spent my birthday alone, relaxing at home. What did you do on your last birthday?
Happy belated birthday! I actually spent my birthday with my family and friends at a local restaurant. It was a lot of fun!
Sounds like you had a great birthday! I'm a mom in telecommunications and I've been in a relationship for 2 years. What about you?
I'm a teacher and I've been in a relationship for 4 years. I love my job because my students are my favorite people. I also love spending time with my family and our movie collection.
That's great! What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I love all kinds of movies, but I especially love action movies and comedies.
Me too! I love to watch action movies when I'm feeling stressed out.
I love to watch action movies with my cat because he loves to chase the animals on the screen.
That's so cute! I love cats. I have one cat and he's the best friend I could ask for.
I'm glad to hear that! Cats are the best.
